channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AL

item.title: Report E-2024090038
item.description:
Report E-2024090038

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-04
  • City: BREWTON
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLEAN HARBORS ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0

  • Description: Driver discovered leake while performing load check at rest area. Driver contained spill and contacted emergency operation center. Emergency response team was dispatched to clean the spill and place unit back on service. Container was overpacked for further transportation.
